document_data.name: Bilvoy Reede
document_data.mainbody: '''Bilvoy Reede''' was a [[Sharran]] Dark Adept and an agent from the hidden [[Cloister of Sombre Embrace]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Bilvoy Reede was tasked with spying on the up and coming Lord [[Enver Gortash]] on behalf of Mother Superior [[Viconia DeVir]]. Bilvoy reported that Lord Gortash, then just a notorious weapons dealer, was a follower of the godling of tyranny [[Bane]] and that he was plotting something with a [[Dark Urge|follower]] of [[Bhaal]] with whom Gortash was seen entering [[Devil's Fee]] magic shop and spending an entire hour there interacting with its proprietor, diabolist [[Helsik]], known for her ability to open ''[[gate]]s'' to [[Hells]] for extravagant fees.
